name: What The Grail ? (Thivet Judicael)
description:
This game was developed around the idea of a runner with a twist.

In this game you control the 4 players with your keyboard (by yourself or with friends), your goal is to go the furthest you possibly can.

We were a team of 8 people to develop this in about a week or so.

In this project I worked as both Game Designer and Graphic Designer.

The game was made using unity, Bender and photoshop.
